org.w3.ldp.testsuite.test

Class CommonResourceTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.w3.ldp.testsuite.test.LdpTest
      • org.w3.ldp.testsuite.test.CommonResourceTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpHeaders, MediaTypes
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RdfSourceTest

    public abstract class CommonResourceTest
extends LdpTest
    Common tests for all LDP resources, RDF source and non-RDF source.

      • updateResource

        protected void updateResource(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource r)
        Update a resource then later test if the updates were applied (i.e., on a subsequent GET). These methods could be overwritten by subclasses.
        See Also:
        verifyUpdatedResource(Resource)

      • verifyUpdatedResource

        protected void verifyUpdatedResource(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource r)
        Update a resource then later test if the updates were applied (i.e., on a subsequent GET). These methods could be overwritten by subclasses.
        See Also:
        updateResource(Resource)

      • restrictionsOnContent

        protected boolean restrictionsOnContent()
        Are there any restrictions on resource content? This should be true for LDP containers since PUT is not allowed to modify containment triples.
        Returns:
        true if there are restrictions on what triples are allowed; false if the entire resource can be replaced with any triples
        See Also:
        testPutReplacesResource(), CommonContainerTest.testRejectPutModifyingContainmentTriples()
